meaning_str.bing:
n. 设计；设计方案；构思；安排
v. 设计；计划；构思；筹划
网络. 图案；图样；外观设计

设计；设计方案；构思；安排

设计；设计图；设计方案；图案；图样；样式；布局；策划；制订
设计；构思；规划；绘制图样；意图；打算；制定；精心策划；预谋；筹划；意欲

sogou-kaoyan.v/n: 设计; 设计图[出现21次)]

sogou-CET6.v/n: 设计; 设计图[出现22次)]

sogou-CET4.v/n: 设计; 设计图[出现87次)]

sogou-gaokao.v/n: 设计; 制图; 图案[出现29次)];设计; 计划; 意图[出现7次)]

1.en: One of the best illustrations of this cycle in recent history can be found in the design choices around the presentation layer.
1.cn: 最佳的图例，最近的历程记录中的此周期的其中一个可以找到周围展示层设计选项中的。

2.en: It is often used interchangeably with design management, but is also liberally applied to any big personality around the industry.
2.cn: 它是经常可以互换和设计管理，但也慷慨适用于任何大的个性在产业。

3.en: After working as an assistant in numerous design studios, he began his own career as a freelance designer in 1991.
3.cn: 在多家设计工作室担任过助理之后，1991年，他开始自己的职业生涯——作为一位自由设计师。

0.en: Why don't you sit in on some design classes?
0.cn: 为什么你不去选修设计课呢？

1.en: He's spent months timing testing his monkey face design.
1.cn: 他花数月时间计时和测试猴脸设计。

2.en: I'm gonna turn it into a showpiece for my clients. Clients of what? Landscape design. Landscape design.
2.cn: 我要把它变成样品院，向顾客展示。什么顾客？园林设计。园林设计？

3.en: Don't yell at me. I'm not manufacturing. I'm just Web design.
3.cn: 别对我吼啊，我又不是负责生产的，我只负责网页设计。

4.en: It's homicidal by design. Walter kills other hosts all the time.
4.cn: 本来的设计就是谋杀犯，沃尔特一直都杀其他的接待员。

5.en: Not looking over your shoulder for Veronica. Don't hate. I helped design Veronica.
5.cn: 不必惦记着维罗妮卡。别生气，是我帮着设计了维罗妮卡。

6.en: We need to discuss this. Where? Can I just say this was a stupid design choice?
6.cn: 我们要谈一谈这个问题。在哪儿？我能说这真是个愚蠢的设计吗？

7.en: Here are the labs where students learn to design and build the doors to the human world.
7.cn: 这是实验室，学生会学习设计和建造通往人类世界的门。

8.en: Marcus used me to design weapons, to help him realize his vision of a militarized Starfleet.
8.cn: 马库斯利用我设计武器，来帮助他实现使舰队军事化的愿望。

9.en: Anything in engineering or design. I'm not picky or proud. I just want to work here.
9.cn: 工程或者设计方面的工作。我不挑剔，也不自满，我只是想在这里工作。

10.en: Through its taste of design and sturdy construction, you'll have plenty of air for eons to come.
10.cn: 高级品味设计、坚固的结构，未来的日子绝对不怕没有空气。

11.en: The design presumes 500 kilograms of Martian soil and samples. Obviously we won't do that.
11.cn: 设计是要带回500公斤的火星土壤和标本，很明显我们不会那么做。

12.en: Parisians are still debating whether this radical design is the vision of a madman or a genius!
12.cn: 对于这建筑的极端设计，究竟是出自疯子还是天才之手，巴黎人至今仍争论不休！

13.en: Sorry I'm late. I got great news. NASA picked my team's design for the deep field space telescope that's going on the International Space Station this spring.
13.cn: 抱歉，我来晚了，我有好消息要宣布，NASA选中了我们小组设计的深空太空望远镜，今春天就要把这个设计用在国际空间站上了。

14.en: What? It is not my fault. Why for put Send button right next to Send All? This is just bad design.
14.cn: 什么？这可不是我的错。你为什么要把发送键放在群发送旁边？这可是不良设计。

15.en: There's no taste, no style. No design. So unless they're shackling you here, why do you stay?
15.cn: 这里没品位，没风格，也没有设计，所以，除非他们把你绑在这里了，你干嘛还在这儿？

16.en: Oh, actually he's the boss. I just pay for everything and design everything, and make everyone look cooler.
16.cn: 噢，其实他才是老大，我只是...负责付钱和设计，让大家看起来更酷炫。

17.en: What do you need that kind of money for? I have figured out an experimental design that may corroborate my latest thinking on string theory.
17.cn: 你要这么大一笔钱干什么啊？我想出了一个实验设计可以证实我最新的弦理论想法。

18.en: Do you know what he did? He watched me work for ten minutes, and then started to design a simple piece of software that could replace me.
18.cn: 你知道他干了什么吗？他看着我做了10分钟，然后开始设计一个可以取代我的简易软件。

19.en: Okay, I see your point. So we break down each of the roles into their component parts, and then design specialized tests for each.
19.cn: 好吧，我懂你的意思了。所以我们把每个职责需要负责的项目拆分开来，然后为它们设计专门的测量项目。
